A good reference : (https://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/LaTeX/Mathematics)

## Fractions

+ __\\frac {a} {b}__  : $\frac {a} {b}$

+ __\\dfrac {a} {b}__ : $\dfrac {a} {b}$ 

## Indices

+ __X_{n1}__ : $X_{n1}$

## Multiplication

+ __a \\times b__ : $a \times b$
